summary: Completed comprehensive testing of InfoShop B2B Catalog for Danone/Infosys BPM. All 15 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend testing verified landing page animation, catalog with 2000 products, search, partner filters, pricing display with savings badges, and cart functionality.

issues: Some products show 'No Picture Available' placeholder - this is expected for products without images from suppliers

critical_code_review_comments: Landing page animation works correctly - shows 12 supplier files dropping into InfoShop folder
Catalog displays 2000 products (1000 Grainger + 1000 MOTION) with correct pricing
Savings badges show 14.8% - 26.2% savings vs supplier list price
InfoShop Part Numbers generated correctly (format: INF + Vendor(2) + Category(3) + Random(5))
Search functionality works - 'bearing' returns 429 MOTION products
Partner filter works correctly - filters by Grainger or MOTION
Cart functionality works - add to cart, view cart, quantity adjustment
seed_data_creation: None - used existing Algolia index with 2000 products
context_for_next_testing_agent: All InfoShop features working correctly. 2000 products indexed in Algolia (1000 Grainger, 1000 MOTION). Pricing shows Danone Preferred Price with 15-26% savings. Landing page animation shows supplier consolidation concept.

Landing Page.details: Hero section with 'You Deal with One, We Deal with Many' tagline. Animation shows 12 supplier files dropping into InfoShop folder. Stats section shows 26+ partners, 3M+ products, 4 regions, 17% avg savings.

Animation Section.details: 'Watch the Magic' and 'Start Consolidation' buttons trigger animation. Files from Grainger, MOTION, BDI, Fastenal, etc. drop into InfoShop folder. Counter shows '12 Suppliers Unified'.

Catalog Page - Product Display.details: 2000 products displayed with correct pricing. Each card shows: brand, product name, InfoShop part number, Mfg part number, UNSPSC code, category badge, UOM, MoQ, stock status, Danone Price, List Price (strikethrough), savings badge.

Catalog Page - Search.details: Search for 'bearing' returns 429 products from MOTION. Real-time search updates results.

Catalog Page - Partner Filter.details: Filter by Grainger shows 1000 products. Filter by MOTION shows 1000 products. 'All Active Partners' shows all 2000.

Catalog Page - Pricing Display.details: Products show: Danone Preferred Price (large blue), List Price (strikethrough), Savings badge (green, e.g., 'SAVE 18.7% vs. Supplier List Price'), Dollar savings amount.

Cart Functionality.details: Add to Cart button works. Cart sidebar shows items with quantity controls (+/-). Total calculated correctly. 'Proceed to Checkout' button visible.

API - /api/algolia/catalog/search.details: Returns products with all required fields: danone_preferred_price, customer_savings_percent, infoshop_part_number, vendor, category, etc.

API - /api/infoshop/partners.details: Returns active_partners: [Grainger, MOTION] and coming_soon_partners for USA, Mexico, Europe, China regions.
